paper_abstract: Answering in a strong form a question posed by Bollobas and Scott, in this paper we determine the discrepancy between two random k-uniform hypergraphs, up to a constant factor depending solely on k. (c) 2013 Wiley Periodicals, Inc. Random Struct. Alg., 47, 147-162, 2015
paper_title: Discrepancy of random graphs and hypergraphs
